thread.section_title: Triple Crown Products Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Triple Crown Products | triplecrownproducts.com
thread.title: Kristie Lara
thread.title_full: Triple Crown Products reviewed by Kristie Lara

author: Kristie Lara
title: Kristie Lara
text: I placed an order requiring samples. I returned the samples to have embroidered and orderd about 10 more. I placed a deposit on order. There are a few transactions going on making it a little hard to keep track of so I don't blame Triple Crown for what I think is an overcharge, but I contacted them over a week ago and they haven't gotten back.
